attributes.name: Age Line
attributes.effect: Prevents people above or below a certain age from access to a target

attributes.name: Anapneo
attributes.effect: Cleared target's airway by vanishing blockages

attributes.name: Animagus Spell
attributes.incantation: Amato Animo Animato Animagus (ah-MAH-toh ah-NEE-moh ah-nee-MAH-toh an-ah-MAY-jus)
attributes.effect: Used as part of the ritual to become an Animagus
attributes.hand: Place wand tip over caster's heart

attributes.name: Anti-Disapparition Jinx
attributes.effect: Prevents Disapparition within a certain area

attributes.name: Arrow Shooting Spell
attributes.effect: Conjures a shooting arrow from the caster's wand

attributes.name: Badgering
attributes.effect: Turns target human into a badger

attributes.name: Bat-Bogey Hex
attributes.effect: Transforms target's bogeys into bats that fly out of the victim's nose
attributes.creator: Miranda Goshawk(mid-20th century)

attributes.name: Bewitched Snowballs
attributes.effect: Bewitches snowballs to follow and harass a designated target

attributes.name: Boggart-Banishing Spell
attributes.effect: Turned a Boggart into something amusing

attributes.name: Broom jinx
attributes.effect: Makes a broomstick attempt to buck its rider off

attributes.name: Bubble Spell
attributes.effect: Creates a stream of non-bursting bubbles

attributes.name: Caterwauling Charm
attributes.effect: Sets off a high-pitched shriek if entered

attributes.name: Cauldron to badger
attributes.effect: Transforms a cauldron into a badger

attributes.name: Cauldron to Sieve
attributes.effect: Turns a cauldron into a sieve

attributes.name: Cribbing Spell
attributes.effect: Assists the caster in cheating on written papers

attributes.name: Cruciatus Curse
attributes.effect: Excruciating pain, insanity if victim was subjected for too long

attributes.name: Curse of the Bogies
attributes.effect: Nasty cold and an extremely runny nose

attributes.name: Cushioning Charm
attributes.effect: Places a cushioning effect on an object
attributes.creator: Elliot Smethwyck (1820)

attributes.name: Dangling Jinx
attributes.effect: Suspends people by the ankles in the air
attributes.creator: Severus Snape

attributes.name: Disintegration spell
attributes.effect: Blows up and disintegrates the target
attributes.hand: Point to the person who the spell should hit

attributes.name: Drought Charm
attributes.effect: Dried up small bodies of water

attributes.name: Dumbledore's Army parchment jinx
attributes.effect: Causes boils to spell 'SNEAK' on the face of a traitor

attributes.name: Everte Statum
attributes.effect: Makes opponent stumble, Causes sharp pain

attributes.name: False memory spell
attributes.effect: Implanted a false memory in the victim's mind
attributes.creator: Mnemone Radford c. 1900s (possibly)
